channel.title: Viktor Pekar
channel.description: A blog dedicated to data analytics and good-looking graphs.

item.title: Directional Accuracy Score and Pesaran-Timmermann test in Python
item.description: A Python function to calculate the Directional Accuracy Score and Pesaran-Timmermann statistic.
item.dc:creator: Viktor Pekar

item.title: Semantic clustering of words with MajorClust and word2vec
item.description: An example applying MajorClust to build semantic clusters of words. The MajorClust code with scikit-learn API can be found here.
item.dc:creator: Viktor Pekar
